channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA Corporation -- GeForce Experience
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA Corporation -- GeForce Experience

item.title: CVE-2016-8827|2024-08-06T02:35:02.274Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- geforce%20experience
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience 3.x before GFE 3.1.0.52 contains a vulnerability in NVIDIA Web Helper.exe where a local web API endpoint, /VisualOPS/v.1.0./, lacks proper access control and parameter validation, allowing for information disclosure via a directory traversal attack.
